summary:
On hiatus

Summary:
Experienced CMO with a proven track record of building communities and creating effective marketing strategies, even on tight budgets.

Led marketing efforts for several successful crypto projects, including Fulbo Galaxy, Woo Network, and Chiliz resulting in significant growth in players, community members and token value.

Skilled in working with cross-cultural teams and handling high-pressure, deadline-driven projects.

Experience:
CMO of Fulbo Galaxy (2021-2023)
Project Manager at MagicFew (2020-2021)
Marketing Associate at Woo Network (2020)
Senior Display Specialist at PHD Media Netherlands (2019-2020)

Pet project:
CMO & Co-founder of CoinScouts (2021-)

Don't hesitate to reach out to me if you have any questions or if you're interested in working together.

position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': 89901784, 'name': 'CoinScouts', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQEbDBLs3kla-A/company-logo_400_400/0/1671176015160?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=-dMGBZfF9ByELYB4r7ZGwdowbFUl-wLZGxJHTQW5Qkc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/coinscouts/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'CoinScouts', 'description': "As the CMO of CoinScouts, I leveraged my expertise in community building to establish a strong and active community for the company. Despite working on this pet project with a limited budget, I implemented effective and low-cost guerrilla marketing strategies to achieve significant results.

With a budget of only $1,000, I successfully built a community of 2,500 members and 30 of them actively contribute to our database on a weekly basis, making CoinScouts the world's first community-powered crypto database. My efforts have also led to a steady growth in website visitors and community feedback has been instrumental in improving our content. I have set an ambitious goal for CoinScouts to be a well-known and reputable crypto brand by the end of 2023, with brand awareness comparable to that of established players like Coinsniper.", 'title': 'Co-founder of CoinScouts.io', 'employment_type': 'Self-employed'}]}, {'company': {'id': 80049086, 'name': 'Fulbo Galaxy', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D0BAQG78qs-K-yCaQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1686663042037?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=1lgCCS1kBNTVeGf0wwn9GOgEPKV1Vfssb9FpJuPtrzQ', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/fulbo-galaxy/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'company': 'Fulbo Galaxy', 'description': "As Chief Marketing Officer of Fulbo Galaxy, I was responsible for building and leading the company's marketing efforts from the ground up. My focus was on creating engaging content and building a community to distribute that content to. As a play-and-earn project, the key performance indicator (KPI) was the number of players. Despite working during a bear market, I was able to create a player base of around 1,000 players and foster a community that had a great deal of loyalty to the brand Fulbo Galaxy, with players playing the game daily even when we didn't organize community giveaway events.

In addition to my marketing responsibilities, I also provided input to the top management team on strategic decisions involving planning key events and helped solve obstacles related to tokenomics and other steps required to transfer the game onto the blockchain.", 'title': 'Chief Marketing Officer', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 33456588, 'name': 'MagicFew', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQEF4ZGdSSkZbA/company-logo_400_400/0/1563279249052?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=5WMOhhzK591ClLA_WCLEevxLtocuUtSfyTd2kyPNuOM', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/magicfew/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Taipei City, Taiwan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'MagicFew', 'description': 'As a Project Manager at MagicFew, I was responsible for leading marketing efforts for dozens of high-profile crypto projects prior to and throughout their token listing phase. My role also involved instructing and leading other team members to ensure that client needs were met.

During my tenure at MagicFew, I successfully managed marketing campaigns for a diverse range of clients, including Gamee (Animoca), Chiliz, AnrKeyX, Pastel Network, Alium, MyDeFiPet, and Seascape. My experience working with clients and team members located worldwide, dealing with time differences, and cultural differences has made me a battle-tested crypto marketing veteran.
